mapper.sql: CartId, UserId, Title, Author, ProductId, StyleId, CreateTime, Status, Phone, OrderNo, InviteStatus, UpdateTime
mapper.select: select from p_myproducts where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by CartId desc
select from p_myproducts where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ProductId=#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by CartId desc

mapper.update:
update p_myproducts
UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ProductId = #{productid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
StyleId = #{styleid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OrderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
InviteStatus = #{invitestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where CartId = #{cartid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p_myproducts set UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProductId = #{productid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, StyleId = #{styleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InviteStatus = #{invitestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CartId = #{cartid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
